title: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work. Description:Color orange doesn't work.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: When the color or background color is set to orange for a report item, the orange color is not applied.
EB: Preview.Expected result: The report item should display with the color/ background color set to orange.
SR: To reproduce:  1. Insert a report item. 2. Set the color or background color of the report item to orange. 3. Execute the report.
